name: Solstice Chronicles: MIA
description: Battle for survival against waves of Martian mutants in this tactical shooter. Using the skills of your drone companion, make fight-or-flight decisions that drastically alter the threats you face. Will your choices lead you to freedom... or your doom?
minimum_requirements: 최소: 운영체제: Win 7, Win 8.1, Windows 10 프로세서: Intel® Core™ i5 메모리: 4000 MB RAM 그래픽: GeForce GTX 750 Ti 저장공간: 15 GB 사용 가능 공간 사운드카드: Any
recommended_requirements: 권장: 운영체제: Windows 10 프로세서: Intel® Core™ i5 메모리: 4000 MB RAM 그래픽: GeForce GTX 960 저장공간: 15 GB 사용 가능 공간 사운드카드: Any
